channel.title: Chess with sean_vh
channel.description: Recent content on Chess with sean_vh

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Sean. Nice to meet you all.

item.title: My First Post - Chess
item.description: Hey everybody! My name is Sean, I really like chess. If you want to learn how to play, join Chess or Lichess If you find a good move, look for a better one - Emanuel Lasker Hope you have a good day. I will be posting “real posts” soon! Game #1 ¶ window.addEventListener("message",e={e['data']&&"7455804"===e['data']['id']&&document.getElementById(`${e['data']['id']}`)&&(document.getElementById(`${e['data']['id']}`).style.height=`${e['data']['frameHeight']+30}px`)}); Italian Opening ¶

item.title: My First Post - Chess
